entry.title: Gulfstream- Paris Nail Bar U-Shaped Combo 1 -Salon Furniture
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gulfstream
Type: Spa Furniture
Price: 5502.75 - 6459.75 (5 variants)

THE VERSATILE PARIS NAIL BAR HIGHLIGHTING CANADIAN CRAFTSMANSHIP.

Introducing Gulfstream’s newest addition:
The versatile Paris Nail Bar highlighting Canadian craftsmanship.
The Paris Nail Bar, a nail bar that is constructed with modular units, giving multiple combination choices allowing flexibility to create your own unique style. Eye-catching sophistication.
This product consists of 2 corners and 3 straight units with the standard flat, square corner, overlay finish on the cabinet ends, or upgrade to the curved radius corner overlay finish, as shown.
Optional UV light cut-outs.
Available in 3 standard laminate choices: Caramel Maple, Prestige Maple, and Truffle. Upgrade to White or Black Gloss Laminate as an available option.

Type: Spa Furniture

LUXURIOUS, RELIABLE, COMFORTABLE. GREAT FOR MANICURE, PEDICURE, WAXING, FACIAL, AND EYELASH EXTENSIONS.
• Luxurious, Reliable, Comfortable
• Great for manicures, pedicures, waxing, facials, and eyelash extensions
• Vibrating massage and roller massage options
• Two separate remote controls, one for the customer and one for the technician
• Elevate customer’s feet to a comfortable position for technicians
• Not just for nail salons,  Zero Gravity Chairs have been used and loved by many in the last 10 years, for watching TV, reading, relaxing or sleeping.
• One Chair - Multi-Purpose Services
• Facial and Body Massage
• Eyelash and Eyebrow Treatments
• Waxing
• Invented by NASA engineers
• Virtually no pressure on the lower back
• May eliminates back pain
• May ease pressure on the heart and expand lung capacity
• May lower blood pressure and heart rate
• May increase blood circulation and oxygen flow
• May reduce swelling in the legs
• Assists in deeper, more relaxed breathing
• May relieve muscle tension and helps to relax the whole body
• Helps to improve the sleep quality
• Recommended by many Chiropractors and Doctors specialized in pain management
